Twitter for Websites | Docs | Twitter Developer Platform   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Twitter for Websites 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Twitter for Websites is a suite of tools bringing Twitter content and functionality to your webpages and apps, enabling the Twitter audience to share your content, and follow your Twitter accounts. 
 NOTE: Â By using Twitter for Websites you agree to the Â  Twitter Developer Agreement and Policy . 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Embedded Tweets
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 AnÂ  embedded Tweet Â brings your pick of content from Twitter into your website articles. Itâs easy to embed a Tweet by copy and pasting HTML markup from the Tweet menus on Twitter.com and TweetDeck, programmatically in your CMS using ourÂ  oEmbed API endpoint , or by installing ourÂ  WordPress plugin . 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Learn more
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sunsets don't get much better than this one over  @GrandTetonNPS .  #nature   #sunset   pic.twitter.com/YuKy2rcjyU — US Department of the Interior (@Interior)  May 5, 2014   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Embedded timelines
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Embedded timelines Â are an easy way to embed multiple Tweets on your website in a compact, linear view. Choose between a profile timeline to get the latest Tweets from a Twitter account, or a List timeline containing a curated list of Twitter accounts. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Learn more
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Tweets by TwitterDev   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Tweet Button
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 TheÂ  Tweet Button Â is a social button for your website for visitors to easily share your content with their followers on Twitter. 
 
 
 
 
 Tweet 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Learn more
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Follow Button
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 TheÂ  Follow Button Â is a social button enabling visitors to easily engage with your Twitter account. 
 
 
 
 
 Follow @TwitterDev 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Learn more
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Configure your own embed
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Build your own embedded Tweet, timeline, or button on publisher.twitter.com. 
 
 
 
 
    
    Try it out
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Explore the oEmbed API
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Use the oEmbed API to programmatically return embedded Tweets and timelines in a simple embed HTML format. 
 
 
 
 
    
    Learn more
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Questions?
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Join the discussion on our Twitter Community developer forum. You can ask questions and help others. 
 
 
 
 
    
    Developer forum

            This page and certain other Twitter sites place and read third party cookies on your browser that are used for non-essential purposes including targeting of ads. Through these cookies,  Google ,  LinkedIn  and  Demandbase  collect personal data about you for their own purposes.  Learn more .
